titleStmt.title: A true discourse of an ouerthrow giuen to the armie of the Leaguers in Prouince by Messieurs D'Esdiguieres and Lauallette. Translated verbatim out of the French copie, printed at Tours by Iamet Mettayer.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Purfoot, dwelling in Saint Nicholas shambles within the New-rents,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Peterborough Cathedral. Library.

place.placeName: Saint Nicholas shambles within the New-rents
